TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XDeclaration extends System.Object

span.span: Represents an XML declaration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Una declaración XML se utiliza para declarar la versión XML, la codificación, y si el documento XML es independiente.An XML declaration is used to declare the XML version, the encoding, and whether or not the XML document is standalone. Esta clase representa el concepto XML de una declaración XML.This class represents the XML concept of an XML declaration. Al igual que en el estándar XML, las declaraciones se asocian con un documento.Just as in the XML standard, declarations are associated with a document. Cuando se crea un documento, tiene la opción para especificar la declaración del documento.When you create a document, you have the option to specify the declaration for the document. El clase contiene la propiedad, que le permite establecer u obtener la declaración.The class contains the property, which allows you to set or get the declaration. Para obtener información acerca de cómo serializar un árbol XML con una declaración XML, vea [serializar con una declaración XML](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/30f1b564-62b5-4e5d-9c36-884e51113feb).For information about how to serialize an XML tree with an XML declaration, see [Serializing with an XML Declaration](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/30f1b564-62b5-4e5d-9c36-884e51113feb).

remarks.format: ## Remarks Principalmente, este constructor se usa internamente para realizar una copia en profundidad de un árbol XML.This constructor is primarily used internally to make a deep copy of an XML tree.

MemberSignature.Value: public XDeclaration (string version, string encoding, string standalone);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string version, string encoding, string standalone) cil managed
Public Sub New (version As String, encoding As String, standalone As String)
public: XDeclaration(System::String ^ version, System::String ^ encoding, System::String ^ standalone);
new System.Xml.Linq.XDeclaration : string * string * string -> System.Xml.Linq.XDeclaration

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

span.span: The version of the XML, usually "1.0".
The encoding for the XML document.

param.name: standalone
param.span: Cadena que contiene "yes" o "no" que especifica si el XML es independiente o requiere que se resuelvan las entidades externas.

span.span: A string containing "yes" or "no" that specifies whether the XML is standalone or requires external entities to be resolved.

summary.span: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase con la versión, la codificación y el estado independiente especificados.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified version, encoding, and standalone status.

remarks.format: ## Examples El ejemplo siguiente crea un documento que contiene una declaración.The following example creates a document that contains a declaration. ```csharp XDocument doc = new XDocument( new XDeclaration("1.0", "utf-8", "yes"), new XComment("This is a comment"), new XElement("Root", "content") ); doc.Save("Root.xml"); Console.WriteLine(File.ReadAllText("Root.xml")); ``` ```vb Dim doc As XDocument = _ content doc.Save("Root.xml") Console.WriteLine(File.ReadAllText("Root.xml")) ``` Este ejemplo produce el siguiente resultado:This example produces the following output: ```xml content ```

span.span: How to: Read and Write an Encoded Document

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Encoding { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Encoding : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: Obtiene o establece la codificación de este documento.

span.span: Gets or sets the encoding for this document.

value.span: Valor de tipo que contiene el nombre de la página de códigos de este documento.

span.span: A containing the code page name for this document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Los valores devueltos por son valores válidos.Any value returned by is a valid value. Si lee un documento codificado, esta propiedad se establecerá en el nombre de la página de códigos.If you read an encoded document, then this property will be set to the code page name. Si establece esta propiedad en un nombre de la página de códigos válido, a continuación, al serializar, LINQ to XML se serializará con la codificación especificada.If you set this property to a valid code page name, then when serializing, LINQ to XML will serialize with the specified encoding. ## Examples En el ejemplo siguiente se crean dos documentos, uno con codificación utf-8 y otro con codificación utf-16.The following example creates two documents, one with utf-8 encoding, and one with utf-16 encoding. A continuación se cargan los documentos y se imprime la codificación en la consola.It then loads the documents and prints the encoding to the console. ```csharp Console.WriteLine("Creating a document with utf-8 encoding"); XDocument encodedDoc8 = new XDocument( new XDeclaration("1.0", "utf-8", "yes"), new XElement("Root", "Content") ); encodedDoc8.Save("EncodedUtf8.xml"); Console.WriteLine("Encoding is:{0}", encodedDoc8.Declaration.Encoding); Console.WriteLine(); Console.WriteLine("Creating a document with utf-16 encoding"); XDocument encodedDoc16 = new XDocument( new XDeclaration("1.0", "utf-16", "yes"), new XElement("Root", "Content") ); encodedDoc16.Save("EncodedUtf16.xml"); Console.WriteLine("Encoding is:{0}", encodedDoc16.Declaration.Encoding); Console.WriteLine(); XDocument newDoc8 = XDocument.Load("EncodedUtf8.xml"); Console.WriteLine("Encoded document:"); Console.WriteLine(File.ReadAllText("EncodedUtf8.xml")); Console.WriteLine(); Console.WriteLine("Encoding of loaded document is:{0}", newDoc8.Declaration.Encoding); Console.WriteLine(); XDocument newDoc16 = XDocument.Load("EncodedUtf16.xml"); Console.WriteLine("Encoded document:"); Console.WriteLine(File.ReadAllText("EncodedUtf16.xml")); Console.WriteLine(); Console.WriteLine("Encoding of loaded document is:{0}", newDoc16.Declaration.Encoding); ``` ```vb Console.WriteLine("Creating a document with utf-8 encoding") Dim encodedDoc8 As XDocument = _ Content encodedDoc8.Save("EncodedUtf8.xml") Console.WriteLine("Encoding is:{0}", encodedDoc8.Declaration.Encoding) Console.WriteLine() Console.WriteLine("Creating a document with utf-16 encoding") Dim encodedDoc16 As XDocument = _ Content encodedDoc16.Save("EncodedUtf16.xml") Console.WriteLine("Encoding is:{0}", encodedDoc16.Declaration.Encoding) Console.WriteLine() Dim newDoc8 As XDocument = XDocument.Load("EncodedUtf8.xml") Console.WriteLine("Encoded document:") Console.WriteLine(File.ReadAllText("EncodedUtf8.xml")) Console.WriteLine() Console.WriteLine("Encoding of loaded document is:{0}", newDoc8.Declaration.Encoding) Console.WriteLine() Dim newDoc16 As XDocument = XDocument.Load("EncodedUtf16.xml") Console.WriteLine("Encoded document:") Console.WriteLine(File.ReadAllText("EncodedUtf16.xml")) Console.WriteLine() Console.WriteLine("Encoding of loaded document is:{0}", newDoc16.Declaration.Encoding) ``` Este ejemplo produce el siguiente resultado:This example produces the following output: ``` Creating a document with utf-8 encoding Encoding is:utf-8 Creating a document with utf-16 encoding Encoding is:utf-16 Encoded document: Content Encoding of loaded document is:utf-8 Encoded document: Content Encoding of loaded document is:utf-16 ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Standalone { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Standalone : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: Obtiene o establece la propiedad standalone de este documento.

span.span: Gets or sets the standalone property for this document.

value.span: que contiene la propiedad standalone de este documento.

span.span: A containing the standalone property for this document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Los valores válidos de la aplicación independiente son "yes" o "no".The valid values for standalone are "yes" or "no". No se aplican estos valores.These values are not enforced. ## Examples El ejemplo siguiente usa esta propiedad para imprimir la propiedad standalone de una declaración.The following example uses this property to print the standalone property of a declaration. ```csharp XDeclaration xd = new XDeclaration("1.0", "utf-8", "yes"); Console.WriteLine(xd.Version); Console.WriteLine(xd.Encoding); Console.WriteLine(xd.Standalone); ``` ```vb Dim xd As XDeclaration = New XDeclaration("1.0", "utf-8", "yes") Console.WriteLine(xd.Version) Console.WriteLine(xd.Encoding) Console.WriteLine(xd.Standalone) ``` Este ejemplo produce el siguiente resultado:This example produces the following output: ``` 1.0 utf-8 yes ```

summary.span: Obtiene o establece la propiedad version de este documento.

span.span: Gets or sets the version property for this document.

value.span: que contiene la propiedad version de este documento.

span.span: A containing the version property for this document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El valor suele ser "1.0".The value is usually "1.0". No se aplica este valor.This value is not enforced. ## Examples El ejemplo siguiente usa esta propiedad para imprimir la propiedad de versión de una declaración.The following example uses this property to print the version property of a declaration. ```csharp XDeclaration xd = new XDeclaration("1.0", "utf-8", "yes"); Console.WriteLine(xd.Version); Console.WriteLine(xd.Encoding); Console.WriteLine(xd.Standalone); ``` ```vb Dim xd As XDeclaration = New XDeclaration("1.0", "utf-8", "yes") Console.WriteLine(xd.Version) Console.WriteLine(xd.Encoding) Console.WriteLine(xd.Standalone) ``` Este ejemplo produce el siguiente resultado:This example produces the following output: ``` 1.0 utf-8 yes ```
